review: Mouse is very responsive and silent. Highly recommend.
It's just an average mouse. Nothing special about it.
SSD speeds are fantastic for my large video files!
Failed after only two weeks of use. Totally unreliable!
manager_reply: We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience and have sent you a replacement immediately.

sentiment: but the lid leaks if I don't screw it tightly.

review: The coffee flavor is robust and smooth
Best headphones I've ever owned. The ANC is superb.
They fit uncomfortably on my ears after about an hour.
The bamboo feels cheap and splintered quickly.

sentiment: but the roast is too dark.
